caption:
The photograph captures an industrial scene involving a crane on a floating platform on a body of water, likely a river. Prominent in the foreground is the crane and its large arm extending vertically into the sky, surrounded by visible emissions of smoke. Positioned on a barge, the crane seems involved in some sort of construction or maintenance activity.

In the background various urban and industrial elements are visible. There is a bridge spanning the river, elevated on tall pillars, with light automobile traffic visible. Several other industrial or warehouse-like buildings crowd the farther shore, and the scene is set against a backdrop of a cloudy sky, tinged with hues of pink and purple, possibly indicating either early morning or late evening light.

The overall composition gives a glimpse into an industrial waterfront area, mingling elements of human activity with the natural environment, under an expansive sky. The photograph has a somewhat dated quality, suggested by the style of the vehicles on the bridge and the general tone and aesthetic, hinting at environmental concerns and industrial activities from a past era.
title: Working dredge at Farmers Union grain terminal shrouded in smoke.
